entry.def: Things that are interlinked or interlink are linked with each other in some way.

example.ex: Those two processes are very closely interlinked...
The question to be addressed is interlinked with the question of human rights.
example.tran: 将要谈到的问题与人权问题有关。

sentences.sentence: "The bones are interconnected via the muscle"

means.word_mean: 2. cause to be interconnected or interwoven
